channel.title: Powersuit Modules missing item
channel.description: I have version 2.0.1 and have completed the biofuel suit milestone. The suit and the modules appear in the equipment bench, but need a Base Module Component, which I cannot find anywhere - it is not in my recipe book. Am I missing something obvious, or has it gone missing?

item.title: Powersuit Modules missing item
item.dc:creator: @Aoini Aoini
item.description:
@Aoini wrote:

OK. After another check on Tier 2, finally found the two sections for armour modules aand now have access. Sure I had looked further over, but I must have missed these for some reason. Sorry to have been a pain. Thanks

Read full topic
